titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent unintended disqualification of trusts as electing small business trusts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/25/2000--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise the definition of electing small business trust to permit as a beneficiary, in addition to the current permitted beneficiaries, a State, a U.S. possession, or the United States.
